name: CodenameTetrix
description:
Warning: the game may contain a few, low intensity, flashing lights.

The evil alien armada, known as the Tetrix, have come to invade the planet Earth... will you be able to stop them?

You play as a space ship that's come to stop an alien armada, known as the evil Tetrix, that currently are on their way to invade Earth. You must shoot down the invaders until they're no more. You get different endings depending on the difficulty you play. The controls are very simple, they are explained in-game in the menu. Above all else, we hope you have fun playing!

This game was made for the Bullet-Hell GameJam 2022.

The only assets made before the Bullet-Hell GameJam 2022 were:

- Player and enemy ship model
